summary: A young celebrity marriage counselor discovers herself left at the altar of her own highly-publicized wedding. To save face, she accepts an offer from her contractor, who secretly has a crush on her, to step in as groom and marry her.
cast: Vanessa Marcil|David Sutcliffe|Karen Holness|Aaron Craven|Kalyn Miles|Larissa Dias|Karen Kruper|Fred Henderson|Austin Anozie|Eileen Barrett|Cadie Fox|Lisa Durupt|Danyella Angel|Trent Pryor
title: El novio oportuno
